Thanks for your response. If using something other than handbrake, how can I convert this to an mp4 file which is 3 gig in size.

You wouldn't want to make the files any larger than they already are - you will actually lost quality in doing so. If you want 3GB per file, get REWARD's rips and follow the following steps.

Programs needed:
MeGUI - http://sourceforge.net/projects/megui/
MKVExtractGUI - http://www.videohelp.com/tools/MKVExtractGUI

1. Open the source .mkv file with MKVExtractGUI.
2. Select the desired streams and press [Extract]
3. Open MeGUI. Navigate to Tools->Muxer->MP4 Muxer (or press [ctrl]+[5])
4. Add the streams into the Video, Audio, Subtitle sections, set language if you want.
5. Press [Queue]. Job should now be queued in MeGUI Queue tab. Press [Start]
6. ...should all work and make a .mp4 file for you using the original source audio and video. No transcoding required.
